fields.label: Cover
fields.statement: This insurance is to indemnify the assured for their ascertained net loss should the insured event be necessarily cancelled, abandoned, postponed, interrupted, curtailed or relocated, which necessary cancellation, abandonment, postponement, interruption , curtailment or relocation is the sole and direct result of a cause not otherwise excluded which occurs during the period of insurance and is beyond the control of the assured and the participant therein, subject to always to the terms, conditions, limitations and exclusion contained in the policy wording or as endorsed hereon

Any work being carried out by builders or other contractors which renders the venue or it facilities unusable in whole or in part unless such work is unknown to the assured at the inception of the insurance or at the time of making booking whichever is the later

Brokers Claim Handling Clause : A loss notification received by the Insurance Broker will be deemed as a loss notification to Insurer. All communications flowing between the Insurer, Insured and the appointed Loss Surveyor should be channelized through the Broker, unless there is any unavoidable reasons compelling direct communications between the parties
